text: nan khux swn hnung cak brrda khaw khxng sing renlab sung rea chicæng hı cea thrab læa cea midi xyu n thi phwk khea khna thi phwk khea yon kheruxng seiyngthay khxng phwk khea (pheux thrab wa) khır nı hmu phwk khea ca di rab xup ka ra marˌyam læa cea midi xyu n thi phwk khea khna phwk khea totheiyng kan
